name: blinkit-mcp
description: Automate grocery shopping on Blinkit directly from Claude Desktop. Search, add to cart, and COD payments.
long_description:
Blinkit MCP allows you to order groceries and essentials directly from Claude.

**Key Features:**
• **Smart Search**: Find products with fast skeleton loader detection
• **Cart Management**: Add items and view cart details
• **COD Payment**: Complete checkout with Cash on Delivery
• **Secure Login**: Phone number & OTP authentication with local session persistence

**Secure & Private** - Runs locally on your machine with Node.js and Playwright.

tools.name: login
tools.description: Login to Blinkit using phone number (starts OTP flow)

tools.name: verify_otp
tools.description: Verify OTP received on phone to complete login

tools.name: add_to_cart
tools.description: Add a product to cart by its index from search results

tools.name: get_addresses
tools.description: Get information about saved delivery addresses

tools.name: place_order_cod
tools.description: Complete checkout and place order using Cash on Delivery
